pragmatic_issues: The class names and attributes should be more explicitly defined with types (e.g., id: int, name: string).
The relationships between classes could be labeled for clarity, indicating the nature of the associations.
recommendations: Define the types of attributes in the Student and Course classes for better clarity.
Add labels to the associations to indicate the nature of the relationships (e.g., 'enrolls', 'contains').
Consider adding multiplicity to the Enrollment class to clarify its relationship with Student and Course.
